adrFormatAddress: 175 E 96th St apt 18p, Manhattan, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text: Amazing NYC wedding photographer! Very easy to work with and works quick to get the perfect shot while keeping to a very strict timeline. The photos are spectacular and it's truly impossible to narrow down from over 1000 photos and choose which ones to frame or put into albums! Highly recommend getting an engagement session if you're nervous about staged photos because Alexey makes you feel very comfortable and you'll get some incredible shots for Save the Dates and your website. I barely noticed the cameras on the day of, but we have so many incredible photos and action shots!

originalText.text: Alexey and his team are simply incredible! His work speaks for itself. Alexey and his team gave us the best memories and we are so grateful. Team is beyond professional and on point. Alexey made the whole experience fun during such a stressful day. From the start to finish the service Alexey and his team provided was truly amazing. We are beyond happy we chose APV as our wedding photo/video vendor!

text.text: Alexey and his team are simply incredible! His work speaks for itself. Alexey and his team gave us the best memories and we are so grateful. Team is beyond professional and on point. Alexey made the whole experience fun during such a stressful day. From the start to finish the service Alexey and his team provided was truly amazing. We are beyond happy we chose APV as our wedding photo/video vendor!

originalText.text: Alexey is amazing. We are so glad we hired him to photograph our wedding! We couldn't be happier with how the photos turned out. He is such a professional and made us feel comfortable right away. Some parts of the wedding can feel stressful with many moving parts, but he made the shoot so easy and enjoyable with his positive attitude. I love how he was able to capture all of the raw emotions from not only my husband and I but also the guests. Overall, very pleased with Alexey's work and can't recommend him enough.

text.text: Alexey is amazing. We are so glad we hired him to photograph our wedding! We couldn't be happier with how the photos turned out. He is such a professional and made us feel comfortable right away. Some parts of the wedding can feel stressful with many moving parts, but he made the shoot so easy and enjoyable with his positive attitude. I love how he was able to capture all of the raw emotions from not only my husband and I but also the guests. Overall, very pleased with Alexey's work and can't recommend him enough.

originalText.text: Alex blew us away with the video clip of our wedding! Our vision was to have a video clip with the audio of our vows and he brought that vision to life beautifully. It was heart-warming, emotional, and 100% us! He included moments that showed off our personalities and genuinely captured the emotions that we felt that day. Alex’s work is so moving it allows us relive the our wedding day every time we watch it. We LOVE the video clip so so much!!!! Alex was incredibly accommodating when our parents asked if we could have a full video of the ceremony after the wedding had passed. While we understood not everything was captured as that was not in our initial request, he included the majority of the wedding in the longer version and it turned out beautifully as well. We are so happy our photographer recommended him and beyond grateful that we picked him as our videographer. Thank you Alex for capturing the heartfelt emotion of our special day! We couldn’t have asked for a more perfect video!

originalText.text:
Alex, what stunning photos! your photography work is exceptional and it was a dream to work with you!
We got married on November at Saint Patrick Cathedral, NYC and to find the best photographer in town was one of the best gift for our day. Our wedding photos and video are treasures that we will remember  forever. I wish I could get married again with the same groom , at the same church and hired the same and best photographer ever!!
